languages.text:
"…скорее, чем ты думал, вор Купца!
Ты пал, подобно капле от чернил,
На ту страницу пьесы, что ведет
К развязке, где прольется кровь родни.
Прими же форму нужных строк, и месть
Сойдет на сцену и свершит свой долг.
А после — прочь из шпилей, за Купцом,
Опасною дорогой сквозь миры,
Где сыщешь либо смерть, либо пути
Найти управу на врага второго".

"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!
Just like a drop of ink you fell upon
The page before this play's dramatic end,
Wherein your own kin's blood you will see shed.
Perform the lines required and vengeance will
Descend upon the stage and play its part.
And then away from spires on Merchant's trail,
Across the worlds a parlous road you'll tread,
And death you will find there, or else a path
To remedy your second enemy."
languages.original_text:
"…скорее, чем ты думал, вор Купца!
Ты пал, подобно капле от чернил,
На ту страницу пьесы, что ведет

Прими же форму нужных строк, и месть
Сойдет на сцену и свершит свой долг.
А после — прочь из шпилей, за Купцом,

Найти управу на врага второго".

languages.text:
「…想像以上に早かったでしょう、私の商人泥棒！
この劇がドラマチックな終わりを迎える前に
ページに落としたインクのようなもの、
同胞の血をそこで流すと分かるでしょう。
求められてるセリフを言えば復讐者は
舞台に現れその役を演じる。
そうすれば商人を裏切った奴は尖塔を離れていく、
星々を渡る危険な道を行けるでしょう。
そこで死を見つけなければ、道はひとつ
第2のあなたの敵を癒やすだけ」
languages.original_text:
"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!
Just like a drop of ink you fell upon
The page before this play's dramatic end,
Wherein your own kin's blood you will see shed.
Perform the lines required and vengeance will
Descend upon the stage and play its part.
And then away from spires on Merchant's trail,
Across the worlds a parlous road you'll tread,
And death you will find there, or else a path
To remedy your second enemy."

languages.text:
“……比你想象的更快，漂泊的商人小贼！
你就像一滴墨水，
滴落在这出好戏结局前的一页，
见证它染红同类的鲜血。
念出命运指定的台词，
复仇的戏码如约而至。
远离为商人指路的尖塔，
你将踏上万劫不复的羁旅。
死亡在此恭候大驾，
或成全你的下一个仇敌。”
languages.original_text:
"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!
Just like a drop of ink you fell upon
The page before this play's dramatic end,
Wherein your own kin's blood you will see shed.
Perform the lines required and vengeance will
Descend upon the stage and play its part.
And then away from spires on Merchant's trail,
Across the worlds a parlous road you'll tread,
And death you will find there, or else a path
To remedy your second enemy."

languages.text:
« ... et plus tôt que vous ne le pensiez !
Comme de l'encre renversée sur la page
De l'ultime scène de cette pièce insensée,
Le sang des vôtres alimentera votre rage.
Interprétez votre rôle et la vengeance espérée,
Viendra bientôt réparer vos outrages.
Puis loin des tours, sur le sentier des marchands,
Nombre de mondes il vous faudra arpenter,
Où avec sa faux, la mort vous attend,
De votre second ennemi, détentrice des secrets. »
languages.original_text:
"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!
Just like a drop of ink you fell upon
The page before this play's dramatic end,
Wherein your own kin's blood you will see shed.
Perform the lines required and vengeance will
Descend upon the stage and play its part.
And then away from spires on Merchant's trail,
Across the worlds a parlous road you'll tread,
And death you will find there, or else a path
To remedy your second enemy."

languages.text:
«¡Y antes de lo que pensaba, mi {mf|ladrón|ladrona} comerciante!
Cual gota de tinta caíste sobre
la página de antes del dramático final de esta obra;
ahí verás derramada la sangre de tu propia familia.
Interprete las líneas requeridas y la venganza
se cernirá sobre el escenario e interpretará su papel.
Y entonces, lejos de las torres del camino {mf|del|de la} comerciante
a lo ancho de los mundos, un funesto camino pisarás;
ahí la muerte encontrarás, o bien un camino
para remediar a tu segundo enemigo».
languages.original_text:
"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!
Just like a drop of ink you fell upon

languages.text:
"Und früher, als gedacht, mein Händlerdieb!
Wie ein Tropfen Tinte, der fiel auf die
Seite vor dem dramatischen Ende,
An dem Ihr Euer eigen Blut vergießt.
Sprecht die Zeilen, auf dass Vergeltung die
Bühne betritt und ihre Rolle spielt.
Zieht dann fern der Türme Eures Weges,
Immer weiter auf gefährlichem Pfad,
Bis dass der Tod Euch findet oder Ihr
Auch Eurem zweiten Feind das Handwerk legt."
languages.original_text:
"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!
Just like a drop of ink you fell upon
The page before this play's dramatic end,

To remedy your second enemy."

languages.text:
"Hırsız Tüccarım, tahmininden de erken,
Bir damla mürekkep misali üzerine düşen!
Bu oyunun dramatik sonuna çevrilmeden önce o sayfa,
Soydaşlarının kanının döküldüğünü göreceksin her satırda.
Sana bahşedilen dizeleri oku, intikamdır gelecek;
Alacak sahnedeki yerini, sana oyunu oynamak düşecek.
Kulelerden uzaklaşma vaktidir çıkan Tüccar'ın yoluna
Dünyaları arşınlayacaksın çıkarak tehlikeli bir yola.
Burada bulacağın ölümdür, hiç olmadı bir yol.
İkinci düşmanına çare olacak oynadığın bu rol."
languages.original_text:
"...and sooner than you thought, my Merchant thief!

And death you will find there, or else a path
To remedy your second enemy."

ikinci düşmanına çare olacak oynadığın bu rol."
